Also to whom it may concern, my interest are the following, but not limited to:

Railroading, astronomy, spaceflight, ponies, Transformers, LEGO, Bionicle, video games (especially games like Sonic, Minecraft, Halo, TF2, Mass Effect, Kerbal, and Rail Simulator), movies, cartoons, not a lot of anime, comics, fanworks, dramatic overreacting, actual acting, randomness, and puns.

ESPECIALLY PUNS.
